source: Hello World

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

An introduction into how to create [AMPHTML ads](/amp-dev/documentation/guides-and-tutorials/learn/a4a_spec.md). AMPHTML ads are ads implemented using AMPHTML. The AMPHTML ads runtime is based on the AMP runtime and provides the same performance benefits. However, there are a few things that make them different from normal AMPHTML files.

Read on: The [AMPHTML Validator](https://validator.ampproject.org/#htmlFormat=AMP4ADS) features a special validation mode for AMPHTML ads.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

An introduction into how to create AMPHTML ads. AMPHTML ads are ads implemented using AMPHTML. The AMPHTML ads runtime is based on the AMP runtime and provides the same performance benefits. However, there are a few things that make them different from normal AMPHTML files.

Read on: The AMPHTML Validator features a special validation mode for AMPHTML ads.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

An introduction into how to create [AMPHTML ads](/amp-dev/documentation/guides-and-tutorials/learn/a4a_spec.md). AMPHTML ads are ads implemented using AMPHTML. The AMPHTML ads runtime is based on the AMP runtime and provides the same performance benefits. However, there are a few things that make them different from normal AMPHTML files.

Read on: The [AMPHTML Validator](https://validator.ampproject.org/#htmlFormat=AMP4ADS) features a special validation mode for AMPHTML ads.

sections.doc_: This tells everyone that this is an AMPHTML ads file.
sections.normalizedDoc_: This tells everyone that this is an AMPHTML ads file.

sections.doc_: The charset definition must be the first child of the `<head>` tag.
sections.normalizedDoc_: The charset definition must be the first child of the `<head>` tag.

sections.doc_: AMPHTML ads require a custom version of the AMP runtime.
sections.normalizedDoc_: AMPHTML ads require a custom version of the AMP runtime.

sections.doc_: The AMPHTML ads boilerplate which is shorter than the regular AMP boilerplate.
sections.normalizedDoc_: The AMPHTML ads boilerplate which is shorter than the regular AMP boilerplate.

sections.doc_: CSS must be embedded inline as well.
sections.normalizedDoc_: CSS must be embedded inline as well.

sections.doc_: Inside the body, AMPHTML ads are only allowed to use a restricted set of HTML and AMPHTML elements as described in the [spec](https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/blob/master/extensions/amp-a4a/amp-a4a-format.md).
sections.normalizedDoc_: Inside the body, AMPHTML ads are only allowed to use a restricted set of HTML and AMPHTML elements as described in the [spec](https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/blob/master/extensions/amp-a4a/amp-a4a-format.md).

sections.doc_: Check out the other [AMPHTML ads samples](/documentation/examples/?format=ads) to learn how to create more sophisticated AMPHTML ads.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Check out the other [AMPHTML ads samples](/documentation/examples/?format=ads) to learn how to create more sophisticated AMPHTML ads.

document.head:
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <title> Hello World</title>
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
document.title: Hello World
document._description: An introduction into how to create AMPHTML ads.
